dublin_core.dcvalue: A simple application based on a free text messaging software installed on mobile phones with limited web access and distributed to CHWs to capture data on various health indicators during their household visits.
Hilde Eugelink, Community Relations Officer, IICD, Email: heugelink@iicd.org
Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Innovation Working Group: NORAD, mHealth Alliance, United Nations Foundation, WHO, Belgium Development Agency (BTC)
Data Collection and Reporting, Malaria, Child Health
